project_descr: Operationalizing the Joint UNDP-UNEP Poverty Environment

outputs.output_descr: A joint UNDP-UNEP Poverty-Environment Facility established to provide advice and support to UN country teams and programme countries to mainstream environment into national policies, strategies and programmes.
donor_name: SWEDISH INTERNATIONAL BIODIVERSITY PROGRAMME (SWEDBIO) AT THE SWEDISH BIODIVERSITY CENTRE (CBM)
